title: why i can't  sign in
body:
why did i sign in see
   PLAYER BANNED
This account has been permanently suspended. please check the email
address associated with your league of legends account for additional details

replies.body: I'm not sure what to say. You can't log in because you've been banned. You'll need to check your email like it says to see why you've been banned, or contact Riot support [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
